name: One Dollar: The game
description:
Do you have an extra dollar in your wallet? You can buy your virtual dollar. Why do you need it? Buying a virtual dollar you help me survive in a cruel Siberia. I live in the village, which is located near the city of Barnaul. It is very bad with work and the Internet. My internet speed is 700-800 Kb / s. Every virtual dollar purchased will help me get out of this nightmare.

If you have a desire to help me a larger amount, I will indicate my paypal:  PayPal
